channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winter storm sweeps across US with snow, ice and severe weather
item.description: A powerful winter storm driven by a rapidly intensifying cyclone is sweeping east from the Plains, bringing heavy snow, ice and rain to much of the co...

item.title: Winter storm brings blizzard conditions and dangerous wind chills
item.description: A powerful winter storm is moving northeast, bringing snow, ice, rain, and strong winds

item.title: Trump says Ukraine and Russia are 'closer than ever' to peace after talks with Zelenskyy
item.description: President Donald Trump says Ukraine and Russia are “closer than ever before” to a peace deal, but he acknowledges that negotiations could still break ...

item.title: Hawaii hopes stricter laws will quiet illegal fireworks after deadly New Year's Eve blast
item.description: Hawaii authorities are cracking down on illegal fireworks after a tragic explosion last New Year's Eve killed six people

item.title: Mexican president says 13 people died in the Interoceanic Train derailment in southern Mexico
item.description: Mexican president says 13 people died in the Interoceanic Train derailment in southern Mexico
